page.title: 16NEW ESTATES AND OLD HOUSES
page.content:
{ NEW ESTATES We interviewed several people living on new estates. They gave us various reasons as to why they live there. These were: nice bungalows, cheaper rates, access to countryside, the fact that it is easy to meet and get to know people. Because the estates are all on the outskirts of the town, the main disadvantage is that people need a car as there are no local buses.
{ OLD HOUSES The people we interviewed gave us these reasons as to why they live in older houses: they are cheaper to buy, have more room, and are more pleasant to live in. Since the houses are old, some have the disadvantages of leaking roofs, bad insulation and rotting woodwork.
